entry.summary:
Vendor: Essential
Type: Spa Equipment
Price: 2895.00

Set yourself up for success with one of our many attractive and well equipped pedicure chair units! This particular unit comes with a beautiful base and leather and includes a Shiatsu massage function! This is a non-pipeless unit.

Type: Spa Equipment
Price: 999.00

The “Rollerball I” hair dryer is another fantastic option for clients who don’t want to come for regular hair color treatments. featuring the same infrared light technology as its predecessor, the “Rollerball I” makes your clients’ hair colour last longer by helping it to penetrate deeply.

The body is made from high-impact ABS plastic to ensure that is can handle whatever you throw at it, as well as removable trays and side storage compartments for easy access to your essentials.

entry.title: Essential Spa Equipment - Facial Steamer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Essential
Type: Spa Equipment
Price: 249.00

This basic facial steamer offers great value at an affordable price. If you're just getting started and need something budget friendly, this is a great option to build up your facial business. Our Essentials Facial Steamer has the following features:
  • Auto shut-off feature
  • Ozone option available
  • Spraying arm turns both directions
  • Easily adjustable height
  • Timer goes up to 60 minutes
  • Electric timer system
  • Height 52.5"

If you're looking for a more advanced steamer with more options included, we highly recommend the Silhouettone Vapo Cirrus which can be found here.

entry.title: Essential Spa Equipment - Electric Massage Bed Superior
entry.summary:
Vendor: Essential
Type: Spa Equipment
Price: 1695.00

This electric massage bed is a great multipurpose treatment bed that offers all the necessary amenities as well as luxury extras. The height and angle adjustments of this bed are controlled by electric motors and a foot pedal, saving you time and effort.

  • Working capacity of up to 400 lbs
  • Adjustable headrest
  • 4 retractable wheels
  • Headrest Angle adjusts from -15° to 60°
  • Height adjustment from 24’’ to 35’’
  • Available colours: black & white
  • Dimension: 208cm x 75cm x 53-94cm

*Please note that delivery charges may apply.

Also check out our article about Servicing Your Spa & Salon Equipment

Need something with thicker padding or more flexibility? Check out the Silhouettone Laguna Mist Flex. It can even be used for pedicures!

entry.title: Essential Spa Equipment - Base Electric Massage Bed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Essential
Type: Spa Equipment
Price: 1299.00

This stable, 2-section spa bed features motorized adjustment of both the height and the angle of the backrest. The removable headrest covers the massage facial hole, allowing the bed to perform any job. The bed also features retractable wheels to facilitate easy transport, and white PVC upholstery fo a sanitary, comfortable surface.

  • Electric height and backrest adjustment
  • Retractable wheels
  • Massage hole and Pillow
  • Max weight: 350 lbs
  • Voltage:100V-120V
  • Frequency: 50hz/60hz
  • Available colours: black & white
  • Dimension: 183cm x 74cm x 63-78cm

*Please note that delivery charges may apply.
